languages.text: {n}Крепкая женщина с копной огненных волос настраивает неизвестный вам аппарат, из которого доносится мелодичное позвякивание. Нижнюю челюсть женщине заменяет грубого вида {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплант{/g}. При вашем приближении он начинает двигаться — словно отдельно от остального лица:{/n} "Добро пожаловать в "Адептус Амасекус", {mf|господин|госпожа}. Чем Октавиана может вас порадовать? {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Амасек{/g}? Лхо? Что-то более... интересное?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Крепкая женщина с копной огненных волос настраивает неизвестный вам аппарат, из которого доносится мелодичное позвякивание. Нижнюю челюсть женщине заменяет грубого вида имплант. При вашем приближении он начинает двигаться — словно отдельно от остального лица:{/n} "Добро пожаловать в "Адептус Амасекус", {mf|господин|госпожа}. Чем Октавиана может вас порадовать? Амасек? Лхо? Что-то более... интересное?"

languages.text: {n}The burly woman with a wealth of fiery hair is in the process of tinkering with some unknown device that is clinking melodiously. She has a rough-looking {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} in place of her lower jaw. As you approach, the implant begins to move, as if independently of the rest of her face.{/n} "Welcome to the Adeptus Amasecus, {mf|sir|ma'am}. What can Octaviana get you? {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g}? Lho? Something more... interesting?"
languages.original_text: {n}Крепкая женщина с копной огненных волос настраивает неизвестный вам аппарат, из которого доносится мелодичное позвякивание. Нижнюю челюсть женщине заменяет грубого вида {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплант{/g}. При вашем приближении он начинает двигаться — словно отдельно от остального лица:{/n} "Добро пожаловать в "Адептус Амасекус", {mf|господин|госпожа}. Чем Октавиана может вас порадовать? {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Амасек{/g}? Лхо? Что-то более... интересное?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The burly woman with a wealth of fiery hair is in the process of tinkering with some unknown device that is clinking melodiously. She has a rough-looking implant in place of her lower jaw. As you approach, the implant begins to move, as if independently of the rest of her face.{/n} "Welcome to the Adeptus Amasecus, {mf|sir|ma'am}. What can Octaviana do you for? Amasec? Lho? Something more... interesting?"

languages.text: {n}这个长着火红色头发的大块头女人正在摆弄某些不知名的装置，发出了悦耳的叮当声。她的下巴上有个看起来很粗糙的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}。当你靠近她时，这个植入物动了起来，仿佛不受面部其他部分的影响。{/n}“欢迎来到艾玛赛克烈酒修会，{mf|先生|女士}。有什么需要奥克塔维娜服务的吗？{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}艾玛赛克酒{/g}？麻烟？还是……更加有趣的东西？”
languages.original_text: {n}The burly woman with a wealth of fiery hair is in the process of tinkering with some unknown device that is clinking melodiously. She has a rough-looking {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} in place of her lower jaw. As you approach, the implant begins to move, as if independently of the rest of her face.{/n} "Welcome to the Adeptus Amasecus, {mf|sir|ma'am}. What can Octaviana get you? {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g}? Lho? Something more... interesting?"

traits.locale_text: {n}这个长着火红色头发的大块头女人正在摆弄某些不知名的装置，发出了悦耳的叮当声。她的下巴上有个看起来很粗糙的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}。当你靠近她时，这个植入物动了起来，仿佛不受面部其他部分的影响。{/n}“欢迎来到艾玛赛克烈酒修会，{mf|先生|女士}。有什么需要奥克塔维娜服务的吗？{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}艾玛赛克酒{/g}？麻烟？还是……更加有趣的东西？”

languages.text: {n}La corpulenta mujer de cabello rojizo toquetea un dispositivo desconocido que tintinea de forma melódica. Como mandíbula inferior usa un {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implante{/g}. Cuando te acercas, el implante se empieza a agitar, como si funcionara de forma independiente al resto de su rostro.{/n} «Bienvenid{mf|o|a} al Adeptus Amasecus. Soy Octaviana, ¿qué te puedo servir? {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}¿Amasec{/g}? ¿Lho? ¿Algo más... interesante?».
languages.original_text: {n}The burly woman with a wealth of fiery hair is in the process of tinkering with some unknown device that is clinking melodiously. She has a rough-looking {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} in place of her lower jaw. As you approach, the implant begins to move, as if independently of the rest of her face.{/n} "Welcome to the Adeptus Amasecus, {mf|sir|ma'am}. What can Octaviana get you? {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g}? Lho? Something more... interesting?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La corpulenta mujer de cabello rojizo toquetea un dispositivo desconocido que tintinea de forma melódica. Como mandíbula inferior usa un {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implante{/g}. Cuando te acercas, el implante se empieza a agitar, como si funcionara de forma independiente al resto de su rostro.{/n} «Bienvenid{mf|o|a} al Adeptus Amasecus. Soy Octaviana, ¿qué te puedo servir? {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}¿Amasec{/g}? ¿Lho? ¿Algo más... interesante?».

languages.text: {n}燃えるような赤髪が豊かに生えている屈強な女性が、カチャカチャと音を立てながら正体不明の装置をいじっている。彼女の下あごには年季の入った{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}が装着されている。こちらが接近すると、顔の他の部分とは独立しているかのようにインプラントが動き始めた。{/n}「アデプトゥス・アマセックへようこそ。このオクタヴィアナにできることはある？{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}アマセック{/g}が飲みたい？それともエルホ？それとも…もっと違うものがほしい？」
languages.original_text: {n}The burly woman with a wealth of fiery hair is in the process of tinkering with some unknown device that is clinking melodiously. She has a rough-looking {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} in place of her lower jaw. As you approach, the implant begins to move, as if independently of the rest of her face.{/n} "Welcome to the Adeptus Amasecus, {mf|sir|ma'am}. What can Octaviana get you? {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g}? Lho? Something more... interesting?"

traits.locale_text: {n}燃えるような赤髪が豊かに生えている屈強な女性が、カチャカチャと音を立てながら正体不明の装置をいじっている。彼女の下あごには年季の入った{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}が装着されている。こちらが接近すると、顔の他の部分とは独立しているかのようにインプラントが動き始めた。{/n}「アデプトゥス・アマセックへようこそ。このオクタヴィアナにできることはある？{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}アマセック{/g}が飲みたい？それともエルホ？それとも…もっと違うものがほしい？」

languages.text: {n}Die kräftige Frau mit der feuerroten Haarmähne tüftelt gerade an einem unbekannten Gerät herum, das melodisch klimpert. An der Stelle ihres Unterkiefers befindet sich ein recht grob aussehendes {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantat{/g}. Als du dich näherst, bewegt sich das Implantat, als funktioniere es unabhängig vom Rest ihres Gesichts.{/n} "Willkommen im Adeptus Amasecus, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Was darf Octaviana Euch bringen? {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g}? Lho? Oder etwas ... Interessanteres?"
languages.original_text: {n}The burly woman with a wealth of fiery hair is in the process of tinkering with some unknown device that is clinking melodiously. She has a rough-looking {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} in place of her lower jaw. As you approach, the implant begins to move, as if independently of the rest of her face.{/n} "Welcome to the Adeptus Amasecus, {mf|sir|ma'am}. What can Octaviana get you? {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g}? Lho? Something more... interesting?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die kräftige Frau mit der feuerroten Haarmähne tüftelt gerade an einem unbekannten Gerät herum, das melodisch klimpert. An der Stelle ihres Unterkiefers befindet sich ein recht grob aussehendes {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantat{/g}. Als du dich näherst, bewegt sich das Implantat, als funktioniere es unabhängig vom Rest ihres Gesichts.{/n} "Willkommen im Adeptus Amasecus, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Was darf Octaviana Euch bringen? {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g}? Lho? Oder etwas ... Interessanteres?"

languages.text: {n}La femme robuste à l'imposante chevelure rousse est occupée à bricoler un appareil étrange qui cliquette de façon mélodieuse. Sa mâchoire inférieure a été remplacée par un {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} d'apparence rudimentaire. À votre approche, celui-ci se met à bouger comme s'il était indépendant du reste de son visage.{/n} « Bienvenue à l'Adeptus Amasecus, {mf|m'sire|ma'ame}. Qu'est-ce qu'Octaviana peut vous proposer ? Un verre d'{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} ? Du lho ? Quelque chose de plus... intéressant ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The burly woman with a wealth of fiery hair is in the process of tinkering with some unknown device that is clinking melodiously. She has a rough-looking {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} in place of her lower jaw. As you approach, the implant begins to move, as if independently of the rest of her face.{/n} "Welcome to the Adeptus Amasecus, {mf|sir|ma'am}. What can Octaviana get you? {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g}? Lho? Something more... interesting?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La femme robuste à l'imposante chevelure rousse est occupée à bricoler un appareil étrange qui cliquette de façon mélodieuse. Sa mâchoire inférieure a été remplacée par un {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} d'apparence rudimentaire. À votre approche, celui-ci se met à bouger comme s'il était indépendant du reste de son visage.{/n} « Bienvenue à l'Adeptus Amasecus, {mf|m'sire|ma'ame}. Qu'est-ce qu'Octaviana peut vous proposer ? Un verre d'{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} ? Du lho ? Quelque chose de plus... intéressant ? »

languages.text: {n}Saçları gür ve ateş kızılı olan iri kıyım kadın; elindeki meçhul bir cihazı kurcalıyor, cihaz da ahenkli tıngırtılar çıkarıyor. Alt çenesinin olması gerektiği yerde kaba saba duran bir {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} var. Sen yaklaşınca implant, sanki kadının yüzünün geri kalanından bağımsızmışçasına hareket etmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Adeptus Amasekus'a hoş geldiniz {mf|beyefendi|hanımefendi}. Adım Octaviana. Ne alırdınız? {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasek{/g}? Liho? Daha... İlginç bir şeyler?"
languages.original_text: {n}The burly woman with a wealth of fiery hair is in the process of tinkering with some unknown device that is clinking melodiously. She has a rough-looking {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} in place of her lower jaw. What can Octaviana get you? {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g}? Lho? Something more... interesting?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Gür ve ateş kızılı saçları olan iri kıyım kadın, elindeki meçhul bir cihazı kurcalarken, cihaz da ahenkli tıngırtılar çıkarıyor. Kadının alt çenesinde kaba saba duran bir {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} var. Sen yaklaşınca, implant sanki kadının yüzünün geri kalanından bağımsızmışçasına hareket etmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Adeptus Amasekus'a hoş geldiniz {mf|beyefendi|hanımefendi}. Adım Octaviana. Ne alırdınız? {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasek{/g}? Liho? Daha ilginç bir şeyler?"
